subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to use JUnits for PL/SQL Stored Procedure
msgSnippet: ... Andrew, Thanks for posting the link - I ll be starting a new Job in a few months where they are turning their entire SW dev over to XP and they use PL/SQL
messageBody:

Andrew,

Thanks for posting the link - I'll be starting a new Job in a few months
where they are turning their entire SW dev over to XP and they use
PL/SQL a lot, so this will help us big time!

Regards

Andrew
